post.author: oliver
post.title: My Visual Studio 2010 Extensions and Favorite Commands
post.content:
Highlight all occurrences of selected word – by an extension by the same name (“Highlight all occurrences of selected word”)

How to use: double-click on a word and see on the left margin where and how often the same word occurs in the current document.

Usage frequency: often.

Collapse all projects – by PowerCommands for Visual Studio 2010

How to use: right click on any node in an open solution and choose “Collapse Projects”.

Usage frequency: often.

 

More to come!
